title: Microwave photonics combines two worlds
title_cn: 微波光子学结合了两个世界
abstract: Microwave photonics, which brings together the worlds of radiofrequency engineering and optoelectronics, has attracted great interest from both the research community and the commercial sector over the past 30 years and is set to have a bright future. The technology makes it possible to have functions in microwave systems that are complex or even not directly possible in the radiofrequency domain and also creates new opportunities for telecommunication networks. Here we introduce the technology to the photonics community and summarize recent research and important applications.
abstract_cn: 在过去的30年中，汇集了射频工程和光电子学两个领域的微波光子学引起了研究界和商业界的极大兴趣，并有望拥有光明的未来。 该技术使得在微波系统中具有复杂功能，甚至在射频领域甚至不可能直接实现功能，也为电信网络创造了新的机遇。 在这里，我们向光子学界介绍了该技术，并总结了最近的研究和重要应用。

title: Atomic spectroscopy on a chip
abstract: Guiding light through hollow optical waveguides has opened the field of photonics to the investigation of non-solid materials that have all the convenience of integrated optics. Of particular interest is the confinement of atomic vapours, such as rubidium, because of its wide range of applications, including slow and stopped light, single-photon nonlinear optics, quantum information processing, precision spectroscopy and frequency stabilization. Here, we present the first monolithically integrated rubidium vapour cell using hollow-core antiresonant reflecting optical waveguides (ARROWs) on a silicon chip. The cells have a footprint of less than 1 cm2, fully planar fibre-optical access, and a cell volume more than 7 orders of magnitude less than conventional bulk cells. The micrometre-sized mode areas enable high beam intensities over near centimetre lengths. We demonstrate optical densities in excess of 2, and saturation absorption spectroscopy on a chip. These results allow the study of atoms and molecules on a platform that combines the advantages of photonic-crystal-like structures with integrated optics.
abstract_cn: 通过中空光波导引导光已经为研究具有集成光学功能的所有非固体材料打开了光子学领域。特别令人感兴趣的是原子蒸气的限制，例如including，因为它的应用范围很广，包括慢速和停止光，单光子非线性光学，量子信息处理，精密光谱学和频率稳定化。在这里，我们介绍了第一个在硅芯片上使用空心反共振反射光波导（ARROWs）的单片集成rub蒸气电池。这些单元的占地面积小于1＆＃160; sup> 2 ，完全平坦的光纤通道，单元体积比传统的散装单元小7个数量级。微米级模式区域可在近厘米的长度上实现高光束强度。我们展示了超过2的光密度，以及芯片上的饱和吸收光谱。这些结果允许在平台上研究原子和分子，该平台将光子晶体状结构的优势与集成光学系统相结合。

title: Operation of a free-electron laser from the extreme ultraviolet to the water window
title_cn: 从极端紫外线到水窗的自由电子激光器的运行
abstract: We report results on the performance of a free-electron laser operating at a wavelength of 13.7 nm where unprecedented peak and average powers for a coherent extreme-ultraviolet radiation source have been measured. In the saturation regime, the peak energy approached 170 µJ for individual pulses, and the average energy per pulse reached 70 µJ. The pulse duration was in the region of 10 fs, and peak powers of 10 GW were achieved. At a pulse repetition frequency of 700 pulses per second, the average extreme-ultraviolet power reached 20 mW. The output beam also contained a significant contribution from odd harmonics of approximately 0.6% and 0.03% for the 3rd (4.6 nm) and the 5th (2.75 nm) harmonics, respectively. At 2.75 nm the 5th harmonic of the radiation reaches deep into the water window, a wavelength range that is crucially important for the investigation of biological samples.
abstract_cn: 我们报告了在波长为13.7nm的自由电子激光器的性能结果，其中已测量到相干的极紫外辐射源的空前的峰值和平均功率。 在饱和状态下，单个脉冲的峰值能量接近170，每个脉冲的平均能量达到70。 脉冲持续时间在10fs的范围内，并且达到10GW的峰值功率。 在每秒700个脉冲的脉冲重复频率下，平均极紫外功率达到20＆＃160mW。 输出光束还包含来自三次谐波（4.6＆＃160nm）和第五次谐波（2.75＆＃160nm）的大约0.6％和0.03％的奇次谐波的重要贡献。 辐射的五次谐波在2.75 nm处到达水窗口的深处，该波长范围对于研究生物样品至关重要。

title: Quantum key distribution over a 40-dB channel loss using superconducting single-photon detectors
title_cn: 使用超导单光子探测器在40 dB信道损耗上的量子密钥分配
abstract: We report the first quantum key distribution (QKD) experiment to enable the creation of secure keys over 42 dB channel loss and 200 km of optical fibre. We used the differential phase shift QKD (DPS-QKD) protocol, implemented with a 10-GHz clock frequency and superconducting single-photon detectors (SSPD) based on NbN nanowires. The SSPD offers a very low dark count rate (a few Hz) and small timing jitter (60 ps, full width at half maximum, FWHM). These characteristics allowed us to achieve a 12.1 bit s–1 secure key rate over 200 km of fibre, which is the longest terrestrial QKD over a fibre link yet demonstrated. Moreover, this is the first 10-GHz clock QKD system to enable secure key generation. The keys generated in our experiment are secure against both general collective attacks on individual photons and a specific collective attack on multiphotons, known as a sequential unambiguous state discrimination (USD) attack.
abstract_cn: 我们报告了第一个量子密钥分配（QKD）实验，该实验能够创建超过42＆＃160dB信道损耗和200＆＃160;光纤的安全密钥。 我们使用了差分相移QKD（DPS-QKD）协议，该协议以10 GHz时钟频率和基于NbN纳米线的超导单光子检测器（SSPD）实施。 SSPD提供了非常低的暗计数率（几赫兹）和小的定时抖动（60 ps，半高全宽，FWHM）。 这些特性使我们能够在200 km的光纤上实现12.1 bit的＆＃8211; 1 安全密钥速率，这是光纤上最长的地面QKD 链接尚未显示。 此外，这是第一个启用安全密钥生成的10 GHz时钟QKD系统。 在我们的实验中生成的密钥可以安全地防止对单个光子的一般集体攻击和对多光子的特定集体攻击，这被称为连续无歧义状态鉴别（USD）攻击。
